name: Murder Party
description:
In a mysterious castle, Villagers relying on magical shields resist the invasion of werewolves, but the mixed-blood werewolves have sneaked in. Villagers VS werewolves: The War begins on the Horizon.

-Explore the mysterious castle and get out magical traps.
-Sneak in as werewolf and pretend to be Villager.
-Collect clues and discover all werewolves.
-Super cute skins and decorations, and more to unlock.
-multiplayer online rank team play, party's best companion
-Ranked teams for masters,win top ranking
